means: 短暂的，非持久的性的，一时的

sentence.Network_en: Can we believe in the credibility of fly - by - night companies ?
sentence.Network_cn: 皮包公司 的信誉值得我们相信 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Don't believe any fly - by - night company , they all lack credibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种没有信誉保证的皮包商, 你千万别信他!

sentence.Network_en: I want a reputable tour operator, not one of these fly - by - night outfit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想找一家信誉好的旅游公司, 而不是那些靠不住的公司.

entry.tran: (商人)唯利是图的，不讲诚信的
entry.def: A fly-by-night businessman is someone who wants to make money very quickly, without caring about the quality or honesty of the service they offer.

example.ex: ...fly-by-night operators who fail to complete jobs.

means.word_mean: 1. a debtor who flees to avoid paying
